text: "One More Time" is a song by Daft Punk. Daft Punk was a French electronic music group. The group released it as a single in 2000. It is a single from their second album, Discovery (2001). Romanthony, an American disc jockey, sings in the song. The song has a sample of "More Spell on You" by Eddie Johns. The music video for the song is from the movie Interstella 5555: The 5tory of the 5ecret 5tar 5ystem (2003). "One More Time" was number one on the French Singles Chart and number two on the UK Singles Chart. Pitchfork wrote that "One More Time" was one of the best songs of the 2000s. Rolling Stone said it was one of the greatest songs ever made. The song was number 61 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Daft Punk songs
title: One More Time (Daft Punk song)
